void SQLiteDatabase::error ( int  iReturnCode,
const std::string &  strMessage 
)

Error handling function. Throws a SQLiteException pointer. The error code and Message will be combined into the SQLiteException message.

Parameters:
iReturnCode - The error code from SQLite.
strMessage - The error message.
